text: A crocodile can't stick its tongue out.
The moon has moonquakes.
Humans share 60% of DNA with bananas.
Napoleon was once attacked by rabbits.
The first computer bug was a real bug.
Bananas are berries
A shrimp’s heart is in its head.
There’s a species of jellyfish that lives forever.
Your nose can remember 50
The Eiffel Tower can grow taller in the summer.
Slugs have four noses.
The first oranges weren’t orange.
Jupiter's Great Red Spot is shrinking.
The internet weighs about the same as a strawberry.
Ancient Egyptians used moldy bread to treat infections.
A day on Venus is longer than its year.
Octopuses have three hearts.
The human brain uses 20% of the body’s energy.
Popcorn was first domesticated in Mexico over 9
The microwave was invented by accident.
An octopus can taste with its arms.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time.
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion smells.
Saturn's moon Titan has lakes of liquid methane.
Honey never spoils — archaeologists found 3000-year-old edible honey.
Cleopatra lived closer to the iPhone than to the pyramids.
The first email was sent in 1971.
Dolphins have names for each other.
The sun makes up 99.8% of the mass in the solar system.
Spaghetti was originally eaten with hands.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space.
Sharks existed before trees.
The average person walks the equivalent of five times around the world in a lifetime.
There's enough DNA in your body to stretch from the sun to Pluto and back.
The first webcam was used to watch a coffee pot.
Tacos were invented before forks.
Venus rotates in the opposite direction to most planets.
The oldest known recipe is for beer.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated.
The first hard drive could hold 5MB and weighed over a ton.
